column5: This Colorado fisherman is not affliated what-so-ever with this fine American small business owner. Do ya got a place where you cherish? Tired of the same ole map on your wall in your den? http://www.lakecarvings.com/products.htmI do not have a map of my lake with debths, so I'm looking at doing a silhouette of my lake with all of the islands and marked fishing spots. I can't wait!
That really looks COOL!!!!!!!!I know what to get my Brother for Christmas now!!FC
Sorry Crazy, he is backlogged till after Christmas! Good things come to those who wait. (Who came up with that stupid saying, anyway)I think its about 2 months.
HMMMMMMMM I really like that idea.I wonder how difficult it would be to do??Well his birthday is in April I guess If I can't do it I'll have to wait.FC
